comments:
eclipse.buildId=I20050527-1300
java.version=1.5.0_02

Error log filling with lot of messages like this:

Error 2005-05-30 12:42:16.995 An internal error occurred during: "Match Job".
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string:
"\home\cvshome\AutoCommonLib\ACL-JbossUtil\src\jbossUtil\org\jboss\ha\singleton\FarmMemberBaseService.java"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
at
org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.console.JavacPatternMatcher.matchFound(JavacPatternMatcher.java:63)
at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.console.PatternMatchListener.matchFound(PatternMatchListener.java:47)
at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.console.ConsolePatternMatcher$MatchJob.run(ConsolePatternMatcher.java:130)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:67)

when launching an ant target that includes a compilation.
The messages always refers, independently on how may classes are being compiled,
to the first class in the list of classes that ant is going to compile.

The same errors are shown in a popup.

I forgot to say that the errors shows only when javac task output some messages,
like errors or warnings.
Did a rework of the JavacPatternMatcher.
